p: Sequences were aligned using the program CLUSTAL X [ 83], followed by manual adjustment using MacClade 4.0 [ 84] and BioEdit Sequence Alignment Editor [ 85]. Non-aligned regions of length variation in V1 and V2 were removed (corresponding to nucleotides 6932â€“6974), and sequences containing internal stop codons or frame shifts were also excluded from analysis as these are thought to be PCR artifacts [ 86].
